channel.title: Model Selection on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Model Selection on Learn with AI

item.title: Cross-Validation
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Cross-Validation ChatGPT answer: What is the purpose of cross-validation in machine learning? How does k-fold cross-validation work and what are its advantages? What are the different types of cross-validation methods and how do they differ from each other? What are the common pitfalls to avoid when using cross-validation in machine learning? How can we use cross-validation to improve the performance of our machine learning model?

item.title: Grid Search
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Grid Search ChatGPT answer: What is Grid Search and how is it used in machine learning? Can Grid Search be used with any machine learning algorithm, or are there specific ones it works best with? How does Grid Search differ from other hyperparameter tuning techniques? What are the advantages of using Grid Search over manual hyperparameter tuning? Are there any limitations or drawbacks to using Grid Search for hyperparameter tuning?
